        --------------------------------------------------------------------- Implements the dereferencing operator. Default(null) xpath is current element. Default attribute(null) get the text. If xpth generates multiple elements, keep the first one only.

      • click

        protected void click​(java.lang.String xpath,
                     boolean linkShouldGo)
        -------------------------------------------------------------- Click on the first WebElement that matches the provided xpath. No path means using current context (error if current context is not a WebElement ).
        Parameters:
        xpath -
        linkShouldGo - - Set to true if the link we click is expected to trigger a page reload.

      • find

        protected java.lang.String find​(java.lang.String s,
                                java.lang.String pattern)
        Check if pattern can be found. By convention, found(null,xx) is always null, found (xx,null) is always true and found (null,null) is null.
        Parameters:
        s -
        pattern -
        Returns:
        - found text, or null if not found.

      • replace

        protected java.lang.String replace​(java.lang.String s,
                                   java.lang.String pattern,
                                   java.lang.String replacement)
        Replace ALL pattern occurences with replacement string. r(null,p,r) is null, r(s,null,r) is s, r(s,p,null) is r(s,p,""). r(null,null,_) is null.
        Parameters:
        s -
        pattern -
        replacement -
        Returns:
        see above
